EnhancedContent: I have several screenshots that are in "dark" mode. The text is white. I would like to reverse the appearance so they can be printed in black text with a white background. Can't for the life of me figure out how this can be done or if it can be done at all. Thanks
Title: Screen Shot modification
Description: ![]() I have several screenshots that are in "dark" mode. The text is white. I would like to reverse the appearance so they can be printed in black text with a white background. Can't for the life of me figure out how this can be done or if it can be done at all. Thanks
Author: Allison_DeleonE
